name: CropProduction
description:
The InVEST crop production model will produce estimates of crop yield, from existing data, percentile summaries, and modeled predictions. For existing or modeled crop yields, the model can also generate estimates of crop value.
NOTE: Please note that the Crop Production model is currently under active development. We do not recommend using this model in decision-making contexts until it has been further tested.

inputParams.name: Lookup_Table
inputParams.description: Filepath to a CSV table used to convert the crop code provided in the Crop Map to the crop name that can be used for searching through inputs and formatting outputs.
inputParams.label: Crop Lookup Table

inputParams.name: Crop_Management_Scenario_Map
inputParams.description: A GDAL-supported raster representing a crop management scenario.
inputParams.label: Crop Management Scenario Map

inputParams.name: Yield_Function
inputParams.description: The method used to compute crop yield. Can be one of three: 'observed', 'percentile', and 'regression'.
inputParams.label: Yield Function

inputParams.name: Percentile_Column
inputParams.description: For percentile yield function, the table column name must be provided so that the program can fetch the correct yield values for each climate bin.
inputParams.label: Percentile Column

inputParams.name: Zipped_Fertilizer_Raster_Folder
inputParams.description: Zipped folder containing fertilized raster maps
inputParams.label: Zipped Fertilizer Raster Folder (optional, only with regression)
inputParams.tooltip: Zipped Fertilizer Raster Folder (optional, only with regression)

inputParams.name: Irrigation_Map
inputParams.description: Filepath to a GDAL-supported raster representing whether irrigation occurs or not. A zero value indicates that no irrigation occurs. A one value indicates that irrigation occurs. If any other values are provided, irrigation is assumed to occur within that cell area.
inputParams.label: Irrigation Map (optional, only with regression)

inputParams.name: Compute_Nutrient_Contents
inputParams.description: If checked, calculates nutrition from crop production and creates associated outputs.
inputParams.label: Compute Nutrient Contents

inputParams.name: Crop_Nutrient_Information
inputParams.description: Filepath to a CSV table containing information about the nutrient contents of each crop.
inputParams.label: Crop Nutrient Information Table

inputParams.name: Compute_Financial_Analysis
inputParams.description: If checked, calculates economic returns from crop production and creates associated outputs.
inputParams.label: Compute Financial Analysis

inputParams.name: Crop_Economic_Information
inputParams.description: Filepath to a CSV table containing information related to market price of a given crop and the costs involved with producing that crop.
inputParams.label: Crop Economic Information Table
